original_text: But Abram said to the king of Sodom, ‘I have made a strong promise to the Lord, the Most High God who made heaven and earth.
korean_text: 아브람이 소돔 왕에게 이르되 천지의 주재이시요 지극히 높으신 하나님 여호와께 내가 손을 들어 맹세하노니

sentences.original_text: But Abram said to the king of Sodom
I have made a strong promise to the Lord
the Most High God who made heaven and earth
